Description of incident: On the weekend of October 21, 2011, a Medcenter One laptop computer and a bag containing 11 internal paper forms for processing patient charges were stolen from an employee's car along with valuable personal items.  The forms contained patient name, date of birth, address, phone number, insurance company and policy number, Medicare number, and patient hearing diagnoses. The stolen laptop contained the names and dates of birth for 650 hearing aid patients from 2003 up to the time of the theft.
